dialogue.htmlContent:
A huge, circular bar is positioned right in the very centre of the tavern, and it's from here that drinks are served to the tauric client√®le. So as to accommodate the taurs who frequent this establishment, the bar's wooden counter is quite tall, and there's not a single bar stool to be seen anywhere around its circumference.

#IF((game.getHourOfDay()>=15 && game.getHourOfDay()<=23)) As it's currently the busy time of day, there's almost no space at all at the bar. Well over a dozen taurs of all kinds are either standing or sitting around the counter, and as you approach you hear them either ordering drinks or flirting and talking with one another. #ELSE As it's currently the quiet time of day, there's plenty of space at the bar. Only a couple of taurs are standing at the counter, and as you approach you hear them talking with one another. #ENDIF

#IF(game.getCharactersPresent().contains(kheiron)) #IF(kheiron.isPlayerKnowsName()) [pc.Stepping] up to the bar, you see Kheiron himself trot around from behind the bar's central pillar, and as he catches sight of you, he flashes you a smile and asks, [kheiron.speech(What can I get for you today, [pc.name]?)] #ELSE [pc.Stepping] up to the bar, you see a huge, olive-skinned centaur, who looks to be in his mid-forties, trot around from behind the bar's central pillar. His muscular, lower horse's body is covered in dark brown hair, which is a similar shade to the short, curly hair on his head. Thanks to the fact that he's only wearing a short-sleeved shirt, you're able to see that his exposed horse-cock and balls are absolutely massive. Just like his horse-half, this centaur's human body is extremely muscular, which, combined with the fact that he's standing at no less than [kheiron.heightValue], leaves you with no doubt that he must be one of the strongest people in all of Elis.

Glancing around the bar, this centaur's hazel eyes catch yours, and after flashing you a handsome smile, he steps forwards and speaks in a low, booming voice, [kheiron.speech(I haven't seen you here before. First time in Elis, or is this just your first time visiting my tavern?)] #ENDIF #ELSE [pc.Stepping] up to the bar, you see that Kheiron isn't here at the moment, and instead there's a large, muscular centauress working behind the counter. Catching sight of you, she steps forwards and asks, [style.feminineSpeech(Hey there, can I get you something?)] #ENDIF

Seeing no reason not to introduce yourself to this friendly centaur, you tell him your name and #IF(pc.isQuestProgressLessThan(QUEST_LINE_MAIN, QUEST_MAIN_3_C_MEETING_MINOTALLYS)) confirm that this is indeed your first time here in Elis. #ELSE explain that you've already spent some time in Elis, but that you're not a native to the town. #ENDIF Nodding as he listens, this centaur responds, [kheiron.speech(It's good to meet you, [pc.name]. My name's Kheiron, and I'm the owner of this tavern. If you need anything, don't hesitate to ask. Oh, and you say that you're not from Elis? Did you come from Dominion, by any chance?)]

After you've confirmed to Kheiron that you have indeed come from the Realm's capital city, the centaur steps right up to the counter and leans in to ask, [kheiron.speech(Did you see a couple of centaurs offering transport out there? They're called Astrapi and Vronti. Know them?)]

#IF(flags.hasFlag(FLAG_innoxia_centaur_transport_introduced)) Having met the centaurs he's asking about, you tell Kheiron that you do know who he's talking about, and that they've recently set up a transportation service between Elis and Dominion. Letting out a relieved sigh, Kheiron steps back and explains, [kheiron.speech(I'm their father, you see. They're not very good at keeping in touch, and as we don't get many visitors from Dominion these days I don't often hear if they're still doing ok out there.)] #ELSE Having not met the centaurs he's asking about, you tell Kheiron that you don't know who he's talking about. Letting out a sigh, Kheiron steps back and explains, [kheiron.speech(I'm their father, you see. They're not very good at keeping in touch, and as we don't get many visitors from Dominion these days I don't often hear if they're still doing ok out there. I guess I'll have to head out and check on them myself some time this week.)] #ENDIF

#IF(game.isHourBetween(8, 24)) With several customers waiting nearby to be served, Kheiron smiles at you and asks, [kheiron.speech(So, can I get you a drink, [pc.name]?)] #ELSE With your brief talk now over, Kheiron smiles at you and reveals, [kheiron.speech(I'm normally in bed at this hour, but I had to come downstairs to get a leaky beer tap fixed. Anyway, can I get you a drink before I head off, [pc.name]?)] #ENDIF

Wanting to make some small talk and get to know Kheiron a little better, you ask him how his day has been going so far. #IF(game.isHourBetween(8, 24)) Despite the fact that there are many customers waiting to be served, the centaur leaves business to his other employees and chooses to engage you in conversation, and replies, #ELSE As there's nobody at the bar who requires his attention, the centaur chooses to engage you in conversation, and replies, #ENDIF [kheiron.speech(Everything's going well, today, [pc.name]. Thanks for asking. How about yourself?)]

Happy to continue talking with him, you respond to Kheiron's question and then continue to engage him in conversation. Talking about everything from the weather to recent events in Elis, the two of you spend the next fifteen minutes talking with one another over the bar's counter. Eventually, however, the muscular centaur declares, [kheiron.speech(It's been good talking with you, [pc.name], but I've got things to be getting on with. Is there anything else I can do for you?)]

Wanting to hear what Kheiron thinks about Lunette, you ask him what he knows of the elder lilin. His eyes narrow a little as he hears your question, and after spending a moment in thought, he replies, [kheiron.speech(Best not to be mentioning that name too loudly in here. You'll not find one person in all of Elis who has a good word to say about Lunette, but taurs can get particularly angry when they start speaking about her.)]

Wanting to know more, you ask the muscular centaur why that's the case, to which he sighs and replies, [kheiron.speech(Lunette's daughters seem to have a particular fondness for taurs. Many of the folk in here used to live out in the fields, and so have been the target of those demonic centaurs' affections, whether they wanted it or not. Let's just leave it at that, ok?)]

As Kheiron is clearly unwilling to say any more about the subject, you decide to move on to something else..

Curious about Kheiron's history, you ask him about his past and how he came to own this tavern. After taking a moment to think about where to start, he begins, [kheiron.speech(There's not really much to tell about most of my life. I used to live out in the woods with a group of other centaurs, but we ended up going our separate ways after Lunette's raiders started taking an interest in us. That was well before they started really getting out of control, but even all those years ago Lunette's daughters were a real pain to deal with.)]

After taking a moment to think, the muscular centaur continues, [kheiron.speech(Everyone else ended up going to Dominion, but I stuck around here in Elis. To cut a long story short, after many years doing all sorts of jobs here in Elis I ended up being given the opportunity to buy this tavern. It was on the verge of being shut down and demolished when I took over, but by converting it into a place that caters for taurs, I managed to turn its fortunes around.)]

Wanting to know a little more about his past, you ask Kheiron whether his son and daughter used to work with him here in Elis, to which he replies, [kheiron.speech(Oh, no. Astrapi and Vronti had no interest in staying in Elis. They went off to Dominion to try and make their own way there. I keep on telling them that they can come and work here with me, but they have no interest.)]

Having had enough of recounting his past, the muscular centaur quickly follows up on his last sentence by asking, [kheiron.speech(Anyway, can I get you a drink, [pc.name]?)]

#IF(game.getCharactersPresent().contains(kheiron)) Feeling thirsty, you ask Kheiron for a glass of water. Grabbing a clean glass from under the bar, he quickly fills it with clean, cold water, before placing it down before you and saying, [kheiron.speech(Here you go, [pc.name]. There's no charge for water.)] #ELSE Feeling thirsty, you get the centauress's attention and ask her for a glass of water. Grabbing a clean glass from under the bar, she quickly fills it with clean, cold water, before placing it down before you and saying, [style.speechFeminine(There you go. The water's free.)] #ENDIF

Bringing the glass up to your waiting [pc.lips], you quickly gulp down the cool, refreshing water. Leaving the now-empty glass on the bar, you wonder whether to order anything else...

#IF(game.getCharactersPresent().contains(kheiron)) Feeling thirsty, you ask Kheiron for a glass of orange juice. Grabbing a clean glass, he opens one of the arcane fridges positioned behind the bar and produces a can of carbonated orange juice. Using his large fingers to fold down the tab, he opens the can and pours the fizzy beverage into the glass, saying, [kheiron.speech(That'll be twenty flames, please.)] #ELSE Feeling thirsty, you get the centauress's attention and ask her for a glass of orange juice. Grabbing a clean glass, she opens one of the arcane fridges positioned behind the bar and produces a can of carbonated orange juice. Folding down the tab, she opens the can and pours the fizzy beverage into the glass, saying, [style.speechFeminine(That'll be twenty flames, please.)] #ENDIF

Handing over the twenty flames, you bring the glass up to your waiting [pc.lips] and quickly gulp down the cool, refreshing beverage. Leaving the now-empty glass on the bar, you wonder whether to order anything else...

#IF(game.getCharactersPresent().contains(kheiron)) Feeling thirsty, you ask Kheiron for a glass of berry soda. Grabbing a clean glass, he opens one of the arcane fridges positioned behind the bar and produces a can of berry soda. Using his large fingers to fold down the tab, he opens the can and pours the fizzy beverage into the glass, saying, [kheiron.speech(That'll be twenty flames, please.)] #ELSE Feeling thirsty, you get the centauress's attention and ask her for a glass of berry soda. Grabbing a clean glass, she opens one of the arcane fridges positioned behind the bar and produces a can of berry soda. Folding down the tab, she opens the can and pours the fizzy beverage into the glass, saying, [style.speechFeminine(That'll be twenty flames, please.)] #ENDIF

Handing over the twenty flames, you bring the glass up to your waiting [pc.lips] and quickly gulp down the cool, refreshing beverage. Leaving the now-empty glass on the bar, you wonder whether to order anything else...

#IF(game.getCharactersPresent().contains(kheiron)) Feeling thirsty, you ask Kheiron for a glass of cola. Grabbing a clean glass, he opens one of the arcane fridges positioned behind the bar and produces a bottle of fizzy cola. Using his large fingers to operate a bottle opener, he pops off the cap and pours the brown beverage into the glass, saying, [kheiron.speech(That'll be twenty-five flames, please.)] #ELSE Feeling thirsty, you get the centauress's attention and ask her for a glass of cola. Grabbing a clean glass, she opens one of the arcane fridges positioned behind the bar and produces a bottle of fizzy cola. Using a bottle opener, she pops off the cap and pours the brown beverage into the glass, saying, [style.speechFeminine(That'll be twenty-five flames, please.)] #ENDIF

Handing over the twenty-five flames, you bring the glass up to your waiting [pc.lips] and quickly gulp down the cool, refreshing beverage. Leaving the now-empty glass on the bar, you wonder whether to order anything else...

#IF(game.getCharactersPresent().contains(kheiron)) Feeling thirsty, you ask Kheiron for a glass of cold-brew coffee. Grabbing a clean glass, he opens one of the arcane fridges positioned behind the bar and produces a bottle of dark black coffee. Using his large fingers to twist off the cap, he pours the caffeinated beverage into the glass, saying, [kheiron.speech(That'll be thirty flames, please.)] #ELSE Feeling thirsty, you get the centauress's attention and ask her for a glass of cold-brew coffee. Grabbing a clean glass, she opens one of the arcane fridges positioned behind the bar and produces a bottle of dark black coffee. Twisting off the cap, she pours the caffeinated beverage into the glass, saying, [style.speechFeminine(That'll be thirty flames, please.)] #ENDIF

Handing over the thirty flames, you bring the glass up to your waiting [pc.lips] and quickly gulp down the cool, refreshing beverage. Leaving the now-empty glass on the bar, you wonder whether to order anything else...

Feeling thirsty, you ask Kheiron for a pint of beer. Grabbing a clean glass, he opens one of the arcane fridges positioned behind the bar and produces a bottle of 'Canine Crush'. Using his large fingers to operate a bottle opener, he pops off the cap and pours the alcoholic beverage into the glass, saying, [kheiron.speech(That'll be forty flames, please.)]

Handing over the forty flames, you bring the glass up to your waiting [pc.lips] and quickly gulp down the cool, refreshing beverage. Leaving the now-empty glass on the bar, you wonder whether to order anything else...

Feeling thirsty, you ask Kheiron for a pint of cider. Grabbing a clean glass, he opens one of the arcane fridges positioned behind the bar and produces a bottle of 'Equine Cider'. Using his large fingers to operate a bottle opener, he pops off the cap and pours the alcoholic beverage into the glass, saying, [kheiron.speech(That'll be forty flames, please.)]

Handing over the forty flames, you bring the glass up to your waiting [pc.lips] and quickly gulp down the cool, refreshing beverage. Leaving the now-empty glass on the bar, you wonder whether to order anything else...

Feeling thirsty, you ask Kheiron for a pint of pear cider. Grabbing a clean glass, he opens one of the arcane fridges positioned behind the bar and produces a bottle of 'Black Stripes Perry'. Using his large fingers to operate a bottle opener, he pops off the cap and pours the alcoholic beverage into the glass, saying, [kheiron.speech(That'll be forty flames, please.)]

Handing over the forty flames, you bring the glass up to your waiting [pc.lips] and quickly gulp down the cool, refreshing beverage. Leaving the now-empty glass on the bar, you wonder whether to order anything else...

Feeling thirsty, you ask Kheiron for a glass of red wine. Grabbing a clean wine glass, he reaches back to the shelves positioned behind the bar and grabs a bottle of red wine. Using his large fingers to operate a bottle opener, he removes the cork and pours the alcoholic beverage into the glass, saying, [kheiron.speech(That'll be sixty flames, please.)]

Handing over the sixty flames, you bring the glass up to your waiting [pc.lips] and spend a few minutes slowly drinking the delicious beverage. Leaving the now-empty glass on the bar, you wonder whether to order anything else...

Feeling thirsty, you ask Kheiron for a glass of white wine. Grabbing a clean wine glass, he opens one of the arcane fridges positioned behind the bar and produces a bottle of white wine. Using his large fingers to operate a bottle opener, he removes the cork and pours the alcoholic beverage into the glass, saying, [kheiron.speech(That'll be sixty flames, please.)]

Handing over the sixty flames, you bring the glass up to your waiting [pc.lips] and spend a few minutes slowly drinking the delicious beverage. Leaving the now-empty glass on the bar, you wonder whether to order anything else...

Feeling thirsty, you ask Kheiron for a glass of vodka. Grabbing a clean glass, he reaches back to the shelves positioned behind the bar and grabs a bottle of vodka. Using his large fingers to unscrew the cap, he pours the alcoholic beverage into the glass, saying, [kheiron.speech(That'll be a hundred flames, please.)]

Handing over the hundred flames, you bring the glass up to your waiting [pc.lips] and spend a few minutes slowly drinking the delicious, highly-alcoholic beverage. Leaving the now-empty glass on the bar, you wonder whether to order anything else...

Feeling thirsty, you ask Kheiron for a glass of rum. Grabbing a clean glass, he reaches back to the shelves positioned behind the bar and grabs a bottle of rum. Using his large fingers to unscrew the cap, he pours the alcoholic beverage into the glass, saying, [kheiron.speech(That'll be a hundred and twenty flames, please.)]

Handing over the one hundred and twenty flames, you bring the glass up to your waiting [pc.lips] and spend a few minutes slowly drinking the delicious, highly-alcoholic beverage. Leaving the now-empty glass on the bar, you wonder whether to order anything else...

Feeling thirsty, you ask Kheiron for a glass of whiskey. Grabbing a clean glass, he reaches back to the shelves positioned behind the bar and grabs a bottle of whiskey. Using his large fingers to unscrew the cap, he pours the alcoholic beverage into the glass, saying, [kheiron.speech(That'll be a hundred and twenty flames, please.)]

Handing over the one hundred and twenty flames, you bring the glass up to your waiting [pc.lips] and spend a few minutes slowly drinking the delicious, highly-alcoholic beverage. Leaving the now-empty glass on the bar, you wonder whether to order anything else...

Feeling thirsty, you ask Kheiron for a glass of champagne. Grabbing a clean champagne flute, he opens one of the arcane fridges positioned behind the bar and produces a bottle of 'Pan's Flute'. Using his large fingers to twist off the cork, he opens the bottle with a loud pop, before pouring the fizzy beverage into the glass, saying, [kheiron.speech(That'll be a hundred and sixty flames, please.)]

Handing over the one hundred and sixty flames, you bring the glass up to your waiting [pc.lips] and spend a few minutes slowly drinking the delicious beverage. Leaving the now-empty glass on the bar, you wonder whether to order anything else...

#IF(game.getCharactersPresent().contains(kheiron))

Feeling a little hungry, you decide to order something to eat, and so ask Kheiron if you can order some bread rolls. Jotting your order down on a slip of paper, he nods and says, [kheiron.speech(That'll be fifty flames, please.)]

Handing over the money, you wait for a few minutes as your order is processed, before a centauress steps out from the kitchen door and calls out, [style.speechFeminine(One bread basket ready!)]

Pointing over at you, Kheiron watches as this centauress sets the bread basket down on the counter in front of you, before smiling at her and saying, [kheiron.speech(Remember to take a break if you're feeling tired.)]

Smiling at Kheiron, the centauress reassures him that she's still full of energy, before trotting back into the kitchen and leaving you to tuck in to the freshly-baked bread rolls...

#ELSE

Feeling a little hungry, you decide to order something to eat, and so you call over the centauress behind the bar and order some bread rolls. Nodding as you give her your order, she smiles and says, [style.speechFeminine(That'll be fifty flames, please.)]

Handing over the money, you wait as the centauress hurries into the kitchen, and then a minute later she returns carrying your order. Setting the bread basket down on the counter in front of you, she flashes you a smile and steps over to the next customer, leaving you to tuck in to the delicious bread rolls...

#ENDIF

#IF(game.getCharactersPresent().contains(kheiron))

Feeling a little hungry, you decide to order something to eat, and so ask Kheiron if you can order some mixed nuts. Jotting your order down on a slip of paper, he nods and says, [kheiron.speech(That'll be fifty flames, please.)]

Handing over the money, you wait for a few minutes as your order is processed, before a centauress steps out from the kitchen door and calls out, [style.speechFeminine(One order of mixed nuts ready!)]

Pointing over at you, Kheiron watches as this centauress sets the bowl down on the counter in front of you, before smiling at her and saying, [kheiron.speech(Remember to take a break if you're feeling tired.)]

Smiling at Kheiron, the centauress reassures him that she's still full of energy, before trotting back into the kitchen and leaving you to tuck in to the delicious assortment of mixed nuts...

#ELSE

Feeling a little hungry, you decide to order something to eat, and so you call over the centauress behind the bar and order some mixed nuts. Nodding as you give her your order, she smiles and says, [style.speechFeminine(That'll be fifty flames, please.)]

Handing over the money, you wait as the centauress hurries into the kitchen, and then a minute later she returns carrying your order. Setting the bread basket down on the counter in front of you, she flashes you a smile and steps over to the next customer, leaving you to tuck in to the delicious assortment of mixed nuts...

#ENDIF

Feeling a little hungry, you decide to order something to eat, and so ask Kheiron if you can order some curly fries. Jotting your order down on a slip of paper, he nods and says, [kheiron.speech(That'll be fifty flames, please.)]

Handing over the money, you wait for a few minutes as your order is processed, before a centauress steps out from the kitchen door and calls out, [style.speechFeminine(One order of curly fries ready!)]

Pointing over at you, Kheiron watches as this centauress sets the bowl down on the counter in front of you, before smiling at her and saying, [kheiron.speech(Remember to take a break if you're feeling tired.)]

Smiling at Kheiron, the centauress reassures him that she's still full of energy, before trotting back into the kitchen and leaving you to tuck in to the delicious bowl of greasy, curly fries...

Feeling a little hungry, you decide to order something to eat, and so ask Kheiron if you can order a shrimp cocktail. Jotting your order down on a slip of paper, he nods and says, [kheiron.speech(That'll be seventy-five flames, please.)]

Handing over the money, you wait for a few minutes as your order is processed, before a centauress steps out from the kitchen door and calls out, [style.speechFeminine(One order of shrimp cocktail ready!)]

Pointing over at you, Kheiron watches as this centauress sets the glass down on the counter in front of you, before smiling at her and saying, [kheiron.speech(Remember to take a break if you're feeling tired.)]

Smiling at Kheiron, the centauress reassures him that she's still full of energy, before trotting back into the kitchen and leaving you to tuck in to the delicious shrimp cocktail...

#IF(game.getCharactersPresent().contains(kheiron))

Feeling a little hungry, you decide to order something to eat, and so ask Kheiron if you can order some p√¢t√© and crackers. Jotting your order down on a slip of paper, he nods and says, [kheiron.speech(That'll be eighty flames, please.)]

Handing over the money, you wait for a few minutes as your order is processed, before a centauress steps out from the kitchen door and calls out, [style.speechFeminine(One order of p√¢t√© and crackers ready!)]

Pointing over at you, Kheiron watches as this centauress sets the plate down on the counter in front of you, before smiling at her and saying, [kheiron.speech(Remember to take a break if you're feeling tired.)]

Smiling at Kheiron, the centauress reassures him that she's still full of energy, before trotting back into the kitchen and leaving you to tuck in to the delicious plate of meat p√¢t√© and crackers...

#ELSE

Feeling a little hungry, you decide to order something to eat, and so you call over the centauress behind the bar and order some p√¢t√© and crackers. Nodding as you give her your order, she smiles and says, [style.speechFeminine(That'll be eighty flames, please.)]

Handing over the money, you wait as the centauress hurries into the kitchen, and then a minute later she returns carrying your order. Setting the bread basket down on the counter in front of you, she flashes you a smile and steps over to the next customer, leaving you to tuck in to the delicious plate of meat p√¢t√© and crackers...

#ENDIF

Feeling quite hungry, you decide to order something to eat, and so ask Kheiron if you can order a serving of fish and chips. Jotting your order down on a slip of paper, he nods and says, [kheiron.speech(That'll be a hundred and fifty flames, please.)]

Handing over the money, you wait for a few minutes as your order is processed, before a centauress steps out from the kitchen door and calls out, [style.speechFeminine(One order of fish and chips ready!)]

Pointing over at you, Kheiron watches as this centauress sets the plate down on the counter in front of you, before smiling at her and saying, [kheiron.speech(Remember to take a break if you're feeling tired.)]

Smiling at Kheiron, the centauress reassures him that she's still full of energy, before trotting back into the kitchen and leaving you to tuck in to the delicious plate of freshly-cooked fish and chips...

Feeling quite hungry, you decide to order something to eat, and so ask Kheiron if you can order some sausages. Jotting your order down on a slip of paper, he nods and says, [kheiron.speech(That'll be a hundred and fifty flames, please.)]

Handing over the money, you wait for a few minutes as your order is processed, before a centauress steps out from the kitchen door and calls out, [style.speechFeminine(One order of sausages ready!)]

Pointing over at you, Kheiron watches as this centauress sets the plate down on the counter in front of you, before smiling at her and saying, [kheiron.speech(Remember to take a break if you're feeling tired.)]

Smiling at Kheiron, the centauress reassures him that she's still full of energy, before trotting back into the kitchen and leaving you to tuck in to the delicious plate of freshly-cooked, high-quality sausages...

Feeling quite hungry, you decide to order something to eat, and so ask Kheiron if you can order a burger. Jotting your order down on a slip of paper, he nods and says, [kheiron.speech(That'll be a hundred and fifty flames, please.)]

Handing over the money, you wait for a few minutes as your order is processed, before a centauress steps out from the kitchen door and calls out, [style.speechFeminine(One burger ready!)]

Pointing over at you, Kheiron watches as this centauress sets the plate down on the counter in front of you, before smiling at her and saying, [kheiron.speech(Remember to take a break if you're feeling tired.)]

Smiling at Kheiron, the centauress reassures him that she's still full of energy, before trotting back into the kitchen and leaving you to tuck in to the delicious burger...

Feeling quite hungry, you decide to order something to eat, and so ask Kheiron if you can order a chicken pie. Jotting your order down on a slip of paper, he nods and says, [kheiron.speech(That'll be a hundred and eighty flames, please.)]

Handing over the money, you wait for a few minutes as your order is processed, before a centauress steps out from the kitchen door and calls out, [style.speechFeminine(One order of chicken pie ready!)]

Pointing over at you, Kheiron watches as this centauress sets the plate down on the counter in front of you, before smiling at her and saying, [kheiron.speech(Remember to take a break if you're feeling tired.)]

Smiling at Kheiron, the centauress reassures him that she's still full of energy, before trotting back into the kitchen and leaving you to tuck in to the delicious, freshly-cooked chicken pie...

Feeling quite hungry, you decide to order something to eat, and so ask Kheiron if you can order a steak. Jotting your order down on a slip of paper, he nods and says, [kheiron.speech(That'll be two hundred and fifty flames, please.)]

Handing over the money, you wait for a few minutes as your order is processed, before a centauress steps out from the kitchen door and calls out, [style.speechFeminine(One steak ready!)]

Pointing over at you, Kheiron watches as this centauress sets the plate down on the counter in front of you, before smiling at her and saying, [kheiron.speech(Remember to take a break if you're feeling tired.)]

Smiling at Kheiron, the centauress reassures him that she's still full of energy, before trotting back into the kitchen and leaving you to tuck in to the delicious, freshly-cooked steak...

Feeling a little hungry, you decide to order something to eat, and so ask Kheiron if you can order a fruit salad. Jotting your order down on a slip of paper, he nods and says, [kheiron.speech(That'll be eighty flames, please.)]

Handing over the money, you wait for a few minutes as your order is processed, before a centauress steps out from the kitchen door and calls out, [style.speechFeminine(One order of fruit salad ready!)]

Pointing over at you, Kheiron watches as this centauress sets the bowl down on the counter in front of you, before smiling at her and saying, [kheiron.speech(Remember to take a break if you're feeling tired.)]

Smiling at Kheiron, the centauress reassures him that she's still full of energy, before trotting back into the kitchen and leaving you to tuck in to the bowl of delicious, refreshing fruit salad...

#IF(game.getCharactersPresent().contains(kheiron))

Feeling a little hungry, you decide to order something to eat, and so ask Kheiron if you can order some honey bread. Jotting your order down on a slip of paper, he nods and says, [kheiron.speech(That'll be eighty flames, please.)]

Handing over the money, you wait for a few minutes as your order is processed, before a centauress steps out from the kitchen door and calls out, [style.speechFeminine(One order of honey bread ready!)]

Pointing over at you, Kheiron watches as this centauress sets the plate down on the counter in front of you, before smiling at her and saying, [kheiron.speech(Remember to take a break if you're feeling tired.)]

Smiling at Kheiron, the centauress reassures him that she's still full of energy, before trotting back into the kitchen and leaving you to tuck in to the delicious plate of honey bread...

#ELSE

Feeling a little hungry, you decide to order something to eat, and so you call over the centauress behind the bar and order some honey bread. Nodding as you give her your order, she smiles and says, [style.speechFeminine(That'll be eighty flames, please.)]

Handing over the money, you wait as the centauress hurries into the kitchen, and then a minute later she returns carrying your order.
